messages.title: YOU CAN MAKE HISTORY
messages.content: You can make a difference at this election by helping to elect the first Green MP in the North. Sheffield Central deserves an MP who will work hard for our city and stand up for the things that matter to you. Youâ€™ve got a straight choice between me and Labour. Make your vote count!

mentions.tacticalSituation: Greens finished a clear 2nd in the 2015 general election and closed the gap on Labour in 2016. Votes cast in the 5 main Sheffield Central wards in May 2016 council elections.

contactInformation.address: Election Agent: Eamonn Ward, 73 Eskdale Rd, Sheffield, S6 1SL.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Eamonn Ward on behalf of Natalie Bennett, both at 73 Eskdale Rd, S6 1SL. Printed by electorally registered Keep It Real prints, Sheffield. Printed on recycled paper.
